data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Jamila stands for JSON Approach to Make Integration Linking
    Applications.

    Jamila enables JavaScript to call remote Perl functions. Perl
    script can use it to call remote Perl functions, too.

    Jamila uses JSON to serialize parameters instead of XML, which is
    used in XMLRPC or SOAP. JSON is easy to use for JavaScript, Perl and
    other languages.
